relproducts.title: Rimini Miami Yellow - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Well, the name says it all. The rimini's miami yellow is bright, funky, and summery. Due to its lightweight but sturdy fabric, it has a surprising level of opaqueness, despite its light colour. Not that you'll notice, with the colour of sunshine in your window. This is the ideal hue for creating a sunny, cheery kitchen, or a fun, energetic home office. Pair with creams and pretty florals for some country chic, or with sky blue shades for a fun, summery feel.

relproducts.description: Camel gold, with gentle ribbing and a silky, flawless finish, the windsor antique offers quite an aesthetic. Opt for a striking look in your master bedroom by setting the antique with a jet black shade. Pattern the walls with a gold and cream damask wallpaper, with hints of black, and choose black bedlinen and rugs, burnished with the occasional gold accent.
